Uses of Class
com.lochbridge.oath.otp.TOTPBuilder

    • Uses of TOTPBuilder in com.lochbridge.oath.otp

      Methods in com.lochbridge.oath.otp that return TOTPBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TOTPBuilder TOTPBuilder.digits(int digits)
      Returns this TOTPBuilder instance initialised with the specified digits.
      TOTPBuilder TOTPBuilder.hmacSha(HmacShaAlgorithm algorithm)
      Returns this TOTPBuilder instance initialised with the specified HMAC-SHA algorithm.
      TOTPBuilder TOTPBuilder.hmacSha1()
      Returns this TOTPBuilder instance initialised with the HmacShaAlgorithm.HMAC_SHA_1.
      TOTPBuilder TOTPBuilder.hmacSha256()
      Returns this TOTPBuilder instance initialised with the HmacShaAlgorithm.HMAC_SHA_256.
      TOTPBuilder TOTPBuilder.hmacSha512()
      Returns this TOTPBuilder instance initialised with the HmacShaAlgorithm.HMAC_SHA_512.
      static TOTPBuilder TOTP.key(byte[] key)
      Returns a new TOTPBuilder instance initialised with the specified key.
      TOTPBuilder TOTPBuilder.timeStep(long timeStep)
      Returns this TOTPBuilder instance initialised with the specified timeStep size.
